scene-001.title: Arriving at Riverhaven
scene-001.body:
You arrive at the bustling town of Riverhaven, a crossroads of trade and intrigue. Three major factions compete for influence here:

**The Merchants' Guild** controls most commerce, led by the shrewd Guildmaster Aldric. They value profit and stability above all.

**The People's Assembly** represents the common folk, championed by the fiery orator Maya Chen. They demand fair treatment and voice in governance.

**The Ironwatch Guard** maintains order, commanded by the stern Captain Thorne. They prioritize security and the rule of law.

Your presence here will not go unnoticed...

scene-002.title: Market District Encounter
scene-002.body: The Market District bustles with activity. Merchants hawk their wares, guards patrol the streets, and common folk go about their business. You sense tension in the air - recent price increases have angered many citizens.

scene-003.title: Assembly Hall Gathering
scene-003.body:
The Assembly Hall is filled with citizens voicing their grievances. Maya Chen stands at the podium, her words electrifying the crowd:

"Too long have we been silent while the merchants profit and the guards impose curfews! We demand representation! We demand justice!"

The crowd roars in approval.

char-001.name: You
char-001.description: A newcomer to Riverhaven, with no allegiance yet to any faction.

char-002.name: Guildmaster Aldric
char-002.description: Leader of the Merchants' Guild. Calculating, wealthy, and influential.

char-003.name: Maya Chen
char-003.description: Charismatic leader of the People's Assembly. Passionate advocate for the common folk.

char-004.name: Captain Thorne
char-004.description: Commander of the Ironwatch Guard. Strict adherent to law and order.

st-trade-boom.title: Merchants Strike Gold
st-trade-boom.description: A lucrative trade deal benefits the Merchants' Guild.

effects.reason: Successful trade deal increases merchant influence
Common folk resentful of merchant wealth

st-price-protest.title: Market Price Protests
st-price-protest.description: Citizens protest rising food prices in the market.

st-guard-crackdown.title: Ironwatch Crackdown
st-guard-crackdown.description: Guards impose strict curfews and arrest protesters.

effects.reason: Show of force increases guard authority

st-assembly-rally.title: People's Assembly Rally
st-assembly-rally.description: Maya Chen holds a massive rally, demanding reforms.

st-merchant-charity.title: Merchants' Charity Drive
st-merchant-charity.description: Guild donates food to win public favor.

st-tax-dispute.title: Tax Collection Dispute
st-tax-dispute.description: Guards and merchants clash over tax enforcement.

st-workers-strike.title: Dockworkers Strike
st-workers-strike.description: Port workers refuse to unload ships, demanding better wages.

st-guard-reform.title: Guard Reform Initiative
st-guard-reform.description: Captain Thorne implements community policing reforms.

st-election-call.title: Call for Elections
st-election-call.description: Assembly demands democratic elections for town council.

st-guard-recruitment.title: Guard Recruitment Drive
st-guard-recruitment.description: Ironwatch recruits new members from citizenry.

st-merchant-monopoly.title: Guild Monopoly Expansion
st-merchant-monopoly.description: Merchants' Guild consolidates control over key industries.

st-peace-treaty.title: Factional Peace Treaty
st-peace-treaty.description: All three factions sign temporary peace accord.

st-corruption-scandal.title: Guard Corruption Exposed
st-corruption-scandal.description: Officers caught taking bribes from merchants.

st-food-shortage.title: Food Shortage Crisis
st-food-shortage.description: Poor harvest leads to food scarcity in town.

st-assembly-concession.title: Merchants Grant Concessions
st-assembly-concession.description: Guild agrees to Assembly demands for better wages.

st-riot-outbreak.title: Street Riots Erupt
st-riot-outbreak.description: Violent riots break out in response to oppression.

st-nl-wealthy-merchant-approach.title: Wealthy Merchant's Proposition
st-nl-wealthy-merchant-approach.description: A wealthy merchant notices you and offers a lucrative partnership - but only if you seem prosperous and trustworthy enough.

preconditions.nl_condition: The player appears wealthy and has a good reputation in town

effects.reason: New business partnership strengthens merchant network

st-nl-factional-tension.title: Brewing Factional Conflict
st-nl-factional-tension.description: Tensions between factions escalate dangerously. The atmosphere in town feels volatile and unpredictable.

preconditions.nl_condition: Relations between the major factions are severely strained and hostile

st-nl-character-trust.title: Maya's Personal Appeal
st-nl-character-trust.description: Maya Chen seeks you out privately. Despite recent conflicts, she believes she can trust you with a sensitive matter.

preconditions.nl_condition: Maya Chen trusts the player despite recent tensions or conflicts

st-nl-moral-dilemma.title: The Ethical Choice
st-nl-moral-dilemma.description: You discover evidence of wrongdoing that could harm innocent people if revealed. The right choice is unclear.

preconditions.nl_condition: The player is facing a difficult ethical dilemma with no clear right answer

st-nl-peaceful-atmosphere.title: Days of Tranquility
st-nl-peaceful-atmosphere.description: The town enjoys a rare period of peace. People relax, businesses thrive, and hope returns.

preconditions.nl_condition: The town atmosphere is peaceful, safe, and optimistic

st-nl-desperation-rising.title: Desperate Times
st-nl-desperation-rising.description: Desperation grips the populace. People are hungry, angry, and running out of patience.

preconditions.nl_condition: The common people are desperate, hungry, and losing hope

st-nl-power-balance.title: Delicate Balance of Power
st-nl-power-balance.description: All three factions are roughly equal in strength. Any small shift could tip the balance dramatically.

preconditions.nl_condition: All three factions have roughly equal power, creating an unstable equilibrium

st-nl-guard-overreach.title: Authoritarian Overreach
st-nl-guard-overreach.description: The guards have become too powerful and oppressive. Citizens whisper about tyranny.

preconditions.nl_condition: The guard is too powerful and acting in an authoritarian or oppressive manner

st-nl-economic-prosperity.title: Economic Boom
st-nl-economic-prosperity.description: Trade is thriving, shops are full, and people have money to spend. The town is prosperous.

preconditions.nl_condition: The town economy is booming and people are generally prosperous

st-nl-imminent-violence.title: Violence Imminent
st-nl-imminent-violence.description: The situation has deteriorated to a breaking point. Violence seems inevitable.

preconditions.nl_condition: The situation is extremely tense and violence seems imminent

events.rationale:

  Tags: crisis, economic, disaster
  Satisfied conditions:
    No preconditions (always satisfied)

  Satisfied conditions:

     world.vars.merchants_power = 60 (satisfies >= 50)
     world.vars.public_sentiment = 50 (satisfies < 60)

  Satisfied conditions:
     world.vars.market_peace = 70 (satisfies >= 60)
